languages.text: "Только здесь никто не требует от тебя с восторженной улыбкой радоваться такому порядку вещей. Так что Комморра нравится мне побольше, чем мой прежний мир".
"The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."
languages.original_text: "Только здесь никто не требует от тебя с восторженной улыбкой радоваться такому порядку вещей. Так что Комморра нравится мне побольше, чем мой прежний мир".

traits.locale_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like Commorragh more than my former world."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “唯一的区别是，这里可没有人要求你手舞足蹈，大唱颂歌。所以没错，比起以前那个地方，我更喜欢这里。”
languages.original_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."

traits.locale_text: “唯一的区别是，这里可没有人要求你手舞足蹈，大唱颂歌。所以没错，比起以前那个地方，我更喜欢这里。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「唯一違うのは、ここでは誰も現状に泣いて喜ぶことを強要しない。だから、私は以前いた世界よりもここが好きです」
languages.original_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."

traits.locale_text: 「唯一違うのは、ここでは誰も現状に泣いて喜ぶことを強要しない。だから、私は以前いた世界よりもここが好きです」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «La única diferencia es que aquí nadie te ordena dar saltitos de alegría por lo bien que funcionan las cosas. Así que sí, me gusta más este sitio que mi antiguo mundo».
languages.original_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."

traits.locale_text: «La única diferencia es que aquí nadie te ordena dar saltitos de alegría por lo bien que funcionan las cosas. Así que sí, me gusta más este sitio que mi antiguo mundo».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."

languages.text: « Finalement, la seule différence avec Commorragh, c'est qu'ici, personne ne vous demande de vous réjouir de cet état de fait. Donc oui, excusez-moi si je préfère cet endroit à mon ancien monde. »
languages.original_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."

traits.locale_text: « Finalement, la seule différence avec Commorragh, c'est qu'ici, personne ne vous demande de vous réjouir de cet état de fait. Donc oui, excusez-moi si je préfère cet endroit à mon ancien monde. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Der einzige Unterschied besteht darin, dass hier niemand von Euch erwartet, dass Ihr Euch über den Status quo freut. Ja, es stimmt, es gefällt mir hier besser als in meiner früheren Welt."
languages.original_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."

traits.locale_text: "Der einzige Unterschied besteht darin, dass hier niemand von Euch erwartet, dass Ihr Euch über den Status quo freut. Ja, es stimmt, es gefällt mir hier besser als in meiner früheren Welt."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Aradaki tek fark, burada kimse her şey bu şekilde olduğu için senden neşeyle hoplayıp zıplamanı talep etmiyor. Yani evet, burayı eski dünyamdan daha çok seviyorum."
languages.original_text: "The only difference is, nobody here demands that you jump for joy about the way things are. So yeah, I like this place more than my former world."

traits.locale_text: "Aradaki tek fark, burada kimse her şey bu şekilde olduğu için senden neşeyle hoplayıp zıplamanı talep etmiyor. Yani evet, burayı eski dünyamdan daha çok seviyorum."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
